name: selai-music-generator
description: Advanced AI Music Generation Platform with Training and Subscription System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: SelAI Music Team
